  • Logan
    5.0 out of 5 stars We love Remy+Roo!
    Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2025
    Verified Purchase
    Ever since I brought my pup home I have bought him bananas from Remy+Roo, that’s really all he wears! I am obsessed with how these look! They are so easy to tie, every bandana is cute and they have AMAZING quality and durability! They’re super easy to just throw in the washer with my clothes and have not worn out at all. The color does not fade and looks exactly like the pictures, but cuter! I do wish there was a little bit more of a selection considering how much I like these. I would buy them all!! LOVE LOVE LOVE! My boy is 45 pounds and the large fits him perfect!
    Logan
